subject: Some useful advices for your health
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Buy Canadian products manufactured according to the same strict medical standards followed in the United States.
For more information click herehttp://similarsegment.hk
High quality of our products is the subject of our primary concern.No fraud and no scamming is possible.
Best regards,Deon Hanna
